title: 87/4/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 December 1986 approving a modification to the programme for the rapeseed sector in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 December 1986
approving a modification to the programme for the rapeseed sector in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(87/4/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The modification to the programme for the rapeseed sector in Denmark, forwarded by the Danish Government on 20 June 1985, is hereby approved insofar as it concerns the expansion of the rapeseed processing sector subject to the reservation set out in the recitals above.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 December 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 151, 9. 6. 1983, p. 56.
